(Smaller) 5'4 Mexican, and weighs about 235; thighs and butt

1.content:
It was less than two hours before Paul had to meet his boyfriend for their 1 year anniversary dinner, and he still hadn’t found a perfect gift for his man. Being an encourager, it wanted to be able to give a satisfying meal to his gainer boyfriend. That meant clothes were out of the question. As were book and video games, since Paul didn’t want something that his boyfriend to enjoy and stop using a few months later. He wanted to get something special that would help their relationships grow.

Feeling like giving up, Paul decided to take a break and get some lunch. He was about to walk into his usually noodle place when he smelled the most delicious combination of ingredients. With his eyes, he took a deep breath of the smell and followed wherever the waif of this delicious meal led him to. When Paul opened his eyes, he saw that he was seated at counter of an empty restaurant. He looked around, but he didn’t see any waiters or customers around to take his order. Just as he was about to get up and leave, there was a gigantic belly that blocked his vision and somehow covered majority of the counter space.

Paul had to strain his neck high up to fully see the giant standing before him. Most men would have been scared and run away, but Paul was paralyzed with lust. The round cheeks on his plump face, the meaty chest, and round, jigglying belly were the perfect parts that Paul loved on a man. He couldn’t wait till his boyfriend was big enough to make this man look small.

A deep, smoothing voice emitted from the thick man, “I know what you’re thinking, and I can help you achieve that for your man.”

Paul’s eyes bugged out as he stared at the giant, fat man before in shock. Before he could gather himself and respond, the biggest ass that he ever seen was faced toward him. It grew bigger as it moved closer to him. Paul’s hands slowly moved closer to the wide bottom before him as he badly tried to resist just going forward and grabbing a handful of that ass. In that flash moment that Paul decided to just go for the grab, the enormous, behemoth unknowingly smacked away his hands with his belly as turned around.

The man dropped a small box in front of Paul. He whispered in a low voice, “There are a few dumplings in this box. Feed them to your boyfriend and it will help him grow to how big that you want him to be, even…..(the giant man started to rub his belly as he continued) bigger than I am now.”
“You mean,” Paul questioned as he pulled the box of dumplings closer to himself, “I could make him big enough to fulfill my Warren Davis fantasy?”
The giant stranger grabbed Paul and pulled his face to rub up against his blubberous belly. “Or, you could even try some of the dumplings yourself to gain a belly like mine”

Paul broke himself away from the strange man. He was scared at what this man has just told and done to him. He was now scared of what this man was capable, and didn’t trust him. He grabbed his box of free food, and ran out of the restaurant. The deep laughter that the belly shaking stranger gave rung into his ears as he finally arrived at his apartment. He slammed the door behind him and tried to catch his breath as he regained his composure.

That’s when Paul’s boyfriend waddled in and he is....
1.title: Growing for your Desire

choices: Really slow? An inch taller  and 10lbs overnight?
By dinner James is starving?
20 pound gain by dinner?!
50 pounds and 6 inches in height?
He's doubled his weight and is taller than Paul in time for dinner?!
11.content:
After a couple of deep breaths Paul had caught his breath and was about to kick off his shoes when he heard the sound of a key slide into the lock. James was already home.
The door opened and James waddled in wearing his slightly tight against his chest and belly red polo shirt and khaki dress pants. A year ago the barely over five foot tall James has a little belly on him at 180 pounds. But over the last year he had packed on an astounding 40 pounds. While fourty pounds doesn't sound like a lot, on a shorter guy the pounds pile up quickly. A lot of the weight on James has gone to his growing gut and chest making him very front heavy. Paul loved it.
" Oh hey babe," James said with his round face lighting up," Saw you just get in when I got off the elevator."
"Yeah, just got home," Paul said with a smile looking at his chubby little boyfriend.
"What's that?" James asked looking at the box.
"Oh, just a little snack before dinner," Paul said handing James the little take out box," Hope you're hungry."
"You know it," winked James and rubbed his belly," What are you going to cook?"
"Noodles and meat sauce."
"My favorite."
"It will be a few, so come in and relax," Paul suggested.
James changed out of his work clothes and got into some much looser clothing. A pair of cotton shorts and a basic white t-shirt that helped show off his curves. The shirt had a few stains from a few feeding sessions and James was looking forward to when it can no longer contain his gut.
James took a seat in the living room and opened up the box and began to munch on the few dumplings inside.
"Sure you don't want any of these? They're great." James asked after eating the first.
"I'm good, I had one earlier. I knew you would love them too," Paul replied getting stuff ready.
"Your loss," James said and inhaled another dumpling.


How fast do these dumplings work?
11.title: The Short Gainer James

choices: Of course he does and he loves it?
He notices it and is shocked?
He's oblivious to it?
114.content:
It wasn't uncommon for James to head into the living room and unwind after a work day and decompress. It helped give him a little breathing room and gave Paul time to cook.
"Sure you don't want any of these? They're great." James asked sitting on the couch and swollowing the first dumpling.
"I'm good, I had one earlier. I knew you would love them too," Paul loved and got got the pan and pots.
"Your loss," James said and inhaled another dumpling.

Paul went to work in the kitchen, cooking up the beef, prepping the sauce, boiling the water, tossing the garlic load in the oven and such. While he was cooking Paul wondered if those dumplings would actually work and James would begin to grow taller and absolutely massive. James had come pretty far so far in the the last year. Going from a chubby guy with a little belly to a full on fat guy with the best boy breasts Paul had ever had the pleasure of playing with. But to see him grow from his short stature to possible giant made Paul a little nervous and excited at the same time.
"Food smells great babe!" James called from the living room.
"Just draining the noodles now, then final prep," Paul called back and drained the massive pile of noodles.
"I love your little touches," James said.
"Little touches, extra calories," Paul replied and stirred a bit of butter on the noodles as he poured them into a massive bowl," Dinner is served."
James licked his lips and hoisted himself the couch with a bit more effort than before. Something was off.
Paul looked at James as he came waddling closer and thought it was a nice touch he squeezed into a shirt that was a little tight a year ago.. then realized that it was the same shirt James was wearing before! The shirt was now pulled tight against James' body and ride up to expose the lower half of his belly which looked bigger than ever. It looked wider and rounder and sagged lower. As James walked closer Paul noticed that all of his clothes were tighter, if now beginning to rip from the sudden weight and .... Paul just realized that James was almost eye level with him. James has grown taller as well. By his guess James must have gained maybe six inches in height and grown a lot fatter.

But does James notice it?
114.title: Relax and Gain

choices: He goes on a binge and eats everything in the apartment?!
Eats a lot more than usual?
About the same amount as his previous size?
1141.content:
Paul was too stunned to move as he watched the bigger in every way James come waddling closer. Where once Paul thought James had snuck to the bedroom to find some old clothes Paul realized that it were the clothes James was wearing earlier. The once cute little 5'1" pocket cub was now nearing average height as Paul realized as James got closer and closer.
"I don't know what you did, but I'm loving it," James said as he got closer and stretched out causing more of his belly to be exposed," What so you think?"
James was now close enough that Paul could feel the heat radiating off James' belly. James took a slight step forward and pushed his belly up against Paul's waist while his hands picked up his grown belly and rubbed it up and down Paul's torso.
"I think it's amazing," Paul exclaimed and grabbed a hold of James' newly expanded body and the two embraced for the first time without both of them craining their necks.
"You hungry?" Paul asked after the embrace.
"Starving," James grinned," Let's see how much this new body can eat!"

Well, does James out do himself?
1141.title: James Plays It Up

choices: A cake to feed to Diego
An necklace with a heart halved.
Something else.
12.content:
That’s when Paul’s boyfriend waddled in on Paul and asked "What's wrong?"
Paul still being in a paranoia state of what had happened, just brushed the comment off saying "Nothing, nothing what's up?"
"I'm fine, glad you are home" and gave Paul a big bear hug.
"OK, well anyway dinner is ready and I am starving!" Diego said shouting loudly "But before we start eating I'd like to give you this."
and handed over his anniversary gift to Paul.

Paul being the one who was always happy to get something from his boyfriend smiled blush fully and unwrapped the big box.
After tearing off the paper he saw...


What's in the box?
12.title: (Smaller) 5'4 Mexican, and weighs about 235...

choices: One or two, slow gain?
Three or four?
Five or six?
Seven or eight?!
The whole box?! Massive gains incoming!
15.content:
After a couple of deep breaths Paul had caught his breath and was about to kick off his shoes when he heard the sound of a key slide into the lock. Carlos was already home.
The door opened and the absolutely massive Latino man squeezed through the doorway. At 6'5" and wieghing in at a little over 400 pounds now, Carlos was a sight to behold. It was just at first sight when Paul spotted him at the local bear bar leaning against the bar ordering a drink and his big wide ass was like two pillows were stuffed in his shorts. Much to Paul's delight Carlos's ass has continued to grow bigger over the last year with a full 40 pound gain . Carlos has never been much of a stuffer, more of a grazer, being able to slowly munch on things all day long, making his big wide drooping belly look bigger too.
Carlos was Paul's giant already and the idea of Carlos growing even bigger excited Paul to no end.
"Oh, hey cutie," Carlos said greeting Paul.
"Hey handsome," Paul said and went in for a hug. Paul melted into the soft cushion of Carlos' body. Paul's face planted his face into Carlos' soft man breasts.
The pair broke from the embrace and Carlos spotted the box of dumplings.
"What's this?" Carlos asked looking at the take out box.
"A little snack for you before I make dinner," Paul said with a smile.
"Nice," Carlos said and look the box.

How many dumplings does Carlos eat before dinner?
15.title: It was Lust at First Sight of a Pear Shaped Chub

info.brief_description: Paul is a small encourager, who receives a mysterious gift for his gainer boyfriend.
info.description: Strictly a M/M story line on gaining. There can be shrinking on occasion, but mostly a focus on getting bigger. Please, only 18+ and no scat
